
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VSpdInfoFramePacket.cpp
          VSpdInfoFramePacket.h
          VSpdInfoFramePacket__Syms.cpp
          VSpdInfoFramePacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS SpdInfoFramePacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SpdInfoFramePacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VSpdInfoFramePacket STATIC VSpdInfoFramePacket.cpp VSpdInfoFramePacket__Syms.cpp
    SpdInfoFramePacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VSpdInfoFramePacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VSpdInfoFramePacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VSpdInfoFramePacket verilated)
